items.name: Oblivion Grasp
implicitMods: 20% of Physical Damage Converted to Cold Damage
Gain 1 Rage on Hit with Attacks, no more than once every 1.2 seconds
explicitMods: 17% increased Attack Speed
+488 to Accuracy Rating
62% increased Evasion and Energy Shield
+80 to maximum Life
craftedMods: 25% of Physical Damage Converted to Cold Damage

socketedItems.secDescrText: Adds a buff that deals Physical Damage over time, while increasing Attack Speed and Life Leech. Killing an enemy while this buff is active refreshes the buff duration, and can grant a Frenzy Charge.
explicitMods: Base duration is 10.80 seconds
Grants 20% increased Attack Speed
1.2% of Attack Physical Damage Leeched as Life
You take 4% of your Maximum Life per second as Physical Damage
You take 4% of your Maximum Energy Shield per second as Physical Damage
25% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Kill
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Summons a Lightning Golem that grants you increased Attack and Cast speed. The Lightning Golem fires a projectile spell, creates orbs of Lightning that zap nearby enemies, and casts a temporary aura that grants added Lightning Damage to spells and attacks used by the Golem and its nearby allies.
explicitMods: Maximum 1 Summoned Golem
Golems grant 9% increased Attack and Cast Speed
20% increased Buff Effect
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will raise the quality of supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
explicitMods: This Gem gains 35% increased Experience
+16% to Quality of Supported Skill Gems
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Zeel's Amplifier
explicitMods: 44% increased Spell Damage
+72 to maximum Energy Shield
+64 to maximum Life
1% increased Area of Effect per Enemy killed recently, up to 50%
You have Zealot's Oath if you haven't been hit recently
flavourText: "Great minds wish to reveal all the secrets of time and space.
But it does not matter. Creation, the act of Matter Metamorphosis,
is the only secret worth discovering."
- Zeel, Vaal Tinkerer

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff providing fire damage based on your physical damage. While you have this buff, if you kill an enemy, other enemies near them will be burned based on the overkill damage. The burn inflicted by this skill can only be affected by modifiers to damage over time (burning damage is damage over time).
explicitMods: Base duration is 4.00 seconds
Base Burning Damage is 30% of Overkill Damage
38% more Burning Damage
Buff grants 15% of your Physical Damage as Extra Fire Damage
Buff grants 12% more Spell Fire Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.baseType: Awakened Increased Area of Effect Support
socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill with an area of effect.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 54% increased Area of Effect
Supported Skills deal 10% increased Area Damage
Supported Skills deal 14% more Area Damage
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Atziri's Promise
explicitMods: Gain 8% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage during effect
2% of Chaos Damage Leeched as Life during Effect
Gain 8% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage during effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: "Death needs not your understanding. It needs only your loyalty."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

items.name: Death Rush
explicitMods: Recover 4% of Life on Kill
Gain Adrenaline for 3 seconds on Kill
flavourText: To truly appreciate life you must be there when it ends

items.name: Oriath's End
explicitMods: 28% increased Charge Recovery
Enemies you Kill during Effect have a 29% chance to Explode, dealing a tenth of their maximum Life as Damage of a Random Element
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: Ennui prevailed, until inspiration sparked
a mote of flame, kindled by fury
and all in his path were obliterated.

items.name: Maloney's Mechanism
explicitMods: Has 2 Sockets
Trigger a Socketed Bow Skill when you Attack with a Bow, with a 1 second Cooldown
12% increased Attack Speed
+62 to maximum Life
5% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks
flavourText: Midnight tinkering begets midday murdering;
a sinister shaft surreptitiously shot slays a scoundrel.
I will see them again, but not until my work is done.

items.name: The Fledgling
explicitMods: 155% increased Armour and Evasion
49% increased Projectile Speed
46% increased Projectile Damage
Projectiles cannot collide with Enemies in Close Range
Far Shot
flavourText: The single well-placed arrow that changes the world
must be preceded by ten thousand practice shots.

items.name: Dying Sun
explicitMods: 135% increased Charges per use
51% less Duration
20% increased Area of Effect during Effect
Skills fire 2 additional Projectiles during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: All things must die.
Whether you burn out or explode is up to you.

items.name: Dread Guide
explicitMods: 18% reduced Attribute Requirements

Adds 31 to 480 Lightning Damage
Grants 4 Life per Enemy Hit

items.name: Headhunter
explicitMods: +57 to Strength
+44 to Dexterity
+58 to maximum Life
29% increased Damage with Hits against Rare monsters
When you Kill a Rare monster, you gain its Modifiers for 60 seconds
flavourText: "A man's soul rules from a cavern of bone, learns and
judges through flesh-born windows. The heart is meat.
The head is where the Man is."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

items.name: Dragon Keep
explicitMods: Ignore Stuns while using Socketed Attack Skills

+70 to maximum Energy Shield
+30 to maximum Life
+22% to Fire Resistance
12% increased Area of Effect
21% increased Stun and Block Recovery
Enemies you Kill have a 34% chance to Explode, dealing a tenth of their maximum Life as Physical Damage

The first shade is beautiful, but the last will drive the unwary insane.
